rooms.description: An open-plan living area with kitchen integrated as per Vastu principles to ensure proper energy flow and connectivity. The layout ensures good natural light and ventilation.
A spacious master bedroom located in the south-east corner for enhanced relaxation, with ample privacy and a view of the pool area. Vastu principles suggest the master bedroom to face east or north.
A secondary bedroom designed for guests. Placed in the west side ensuring good airflow and minimal disturbances from pool noise.
Primary bathroom serving both bedrooms. Vastu guidelines recommend placement to not conflict with water flow.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with Vastu's north direction for positive energy and prosperity.
Secondary exit ensuring smooth flow of traffic in emergency scenarios.
